definitions.meaning:
[u][c]评审，审查，检查，检讨（以进行必要的修改）
an examination of sth, with the intention of changing it if necessary

examples.content:
the government's review of its education policy
政府对其教育政策的检讨

The case is subject to judicial review .
这个案子必须接受司法审查。

definitions.meaning:
[c][u]
（对图书、戏剧、电影等的）评介，评论
a report in a newspaper or magazine, or on the Internet, television or radio, in which sb gives their opinion of a book, play, film/movie, etc.;
the act of writing this kind of report

examples.content:
the reviews (page) in the papers
报纸的评论版

He submitted his latest novel for review.
他提交了自己的最新小说供评论。

definitions.meaning:
[c]报告；汇报；述评；回顾
a report on a subject or on a series of events

examples.content:
a review of customer complaints
有关消费者投诉的汇报

to publish a review of recent cancer research
发表有关最近癌症研究的报告

definitions.meaning:
[c]阅兵式；检阅
a ceremony that involves an official inspection of soldiers, etc. by an important visitor

[c]（尤指为准备考试的）温习课，复习课
a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

~ sth复查；重新考虑
to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes

examples.content:
to review the evidence
复查证据

The government will review the situation later in the year.
政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

definitions.meaning:
~ sth回顾；反思
to think about past events, for example to try to understand why they happened

examples.content:
to review your failures and triumphs
回顾自己的成功和失败

She had been reviewing the previous week on her way home.
她在回家的路上对前一个星期进行了回顾。

definitions.meaning:
~ sth写（关于书籍、戏剧、电影等的）评论；评介
to write a report of a book, play, film/movie, etc. in which you give your opinion of it

examples.content:
The play was reviewed in the national newspapers.
全国性报纸都对这部戏剧作了评论。

definitions.meaning:
~ sb/sth检阅（部队）
to make an official inspection of a group of soldiers, etc. in a military ceremony

~ sth
（尤指为准备考试而）温习，复习to look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

~ sth校阅；审核
to check a piece of work to see if there are any mistakes
